name: POCO M7
specs:
• Chipset: MediaTek Helio G85 (12nm)
• CPU: Octa-core (2x Cortex-A75 + 6x Cortex-A55)
• GPU: Mali-G52 MC2
• Display: 6.6" IPS LCD, FHD+ (1080 x 2408)
• RAM: 4GB / 6GB
• Storage: 64GB / 128GB (expandable via microSD)
• Rear Camera: 50MP AI Dual Camera
• Front Camera: 8MP
• Battery: 5000mAh (18W Fast Charging, USB-C)
• Operating System: Android 13 (MIUI for POCO)
• Connectivity: 4G LTE, Dual SIM, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5.0
• Security: Side-mounted Fingerprint Sensor, Face Unlock

name: Nubia Neo 3
specs:
• Chipset: Unisoc T820 (6nm)
• CPU: Octa-core (1x Cortex-A76 + 3x Cortex-A76 + 4x Cortex-A55)
• GPU: Mali-G57
• Display: 6.6" IPS LCD, 120Hz, FHD+
• Memory: 8GB RAM
• Storage: 128GB UFS 3.1
• Rear Camera: 50MP + 2MP
• Front Camera: 16MP
• Battery: 4500mAh (22.5W Fast Charging)
• Operating System: Android 13 (MyOS)
• Connectivity: 4G LTE

name: Redmi 15C
specs:
• Chipset: Unisoc T616 (12nm)
• CPU: Octa-core (2x Cortex-A75 + 6x Cortex-A55)
• GPU: Mali-G57 MC2
• Display: 6.74" IPS LCD, 90Hz, 720 x 1650 px (~268ppi)
• RAM: 6GB / 8GB LPDDR4X
• Internal Storage: 128GB / 256GB UFS 2.1
• Expandable Storage: microSD up to 1TB
• Rear Camera: 50MP f/1.8 (AF) + 2MP Depth
• Front Camera: 8MP f/2.0
• Battery: 5000mAh
• Charging: 18W Wired Fast Charging
• Operating System: Android 13 (MIUI)
• Network: Dual SIM 4G LTE
• Connectivity: Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Bluetooth 5.0, GPS
• Sensors: Rear Fingerprint, Accelerometer, Proximity, Compass
• Audio: 3.5mm Headphone Jack, Loudspeaker

name: Xiaomi Poco C85
specs:
• Chipset: MediaTek Helio G99 (6nm)
• CPU: Octa-core (2x Cortex-A76 + 6x Cortex-A55)
• GPU: Mali-G57 MC2
• Display: 6.67" AMOLED, 120Hz, FHD+ (1080 x 2400)
• RAM: 8GB / 12GB LPDDR4X
• Storage: 128GB / 256GB UFS 2.2
• Rear Camera: 108MP Main + 8MP Ultra-wide + 2MP Macro
• Front Camera: 16MP
• Battery: 6000mAh (33W Fast Charging)
• Operating System: Android 14 (MIUI)
• Connectivity: 4G LTE, Wi-Fi 5, Bluetooth 5.3, GPS
• Security: Side-mounted Fingerprint, Face Unlock
